alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, northeastern Butte and Clark Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Monteview, or 15 miles west of Dubois, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubois, Terreton, Mud Lake, Spencer, Northwest Inl, Monteview, Edie School, Small, Monida Pass and Humphrey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Idaho.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lost River Valleys
